title: Sydney Showboats host fantastic New Year's Eve fireworks cruises (Tom John)
text: By Tom John Jul 1, 2015 How would you like to spend New Year's Eve 2015 in Sydney aboard a luxury paddlewheeler that promises a night full of spectacular sights, great food and great entertainment? Think about it... You'll be bringing in the New Year with a fantastic fireworks party on Sydney Harbour aboard an authentic padddlewheeler with gorgeous interiors, cathedral windows and wrap-around balconies, reminiscent of a bygone glamorous era. It's actually quite a no-brainer... there's no place else you'd rather be than aboard the Sydney Showboats New Year's Eve Fireworks Party Cruise!The Sydney Showboat and the Harbour Ballroom offer exclusive New Year's Eve Fireworks Cruise packages that are designed to delight every guest. With the grandiosity of the Sydney Harbour attractions and activities outdoors and splendour of the entertainment and party atmosphere indoors, you're pretty much guaranteed an unforgettable Sydney Harbour New Year's Eve cruise!The Sydney Showboat New Year's Eve 2015 package includes an incredible seven-hour cruise, a five-course, restaurant-quality seated and served dinner and a premium selection of all beverages for the duration of the cruise.The Showboat is fully air-conditioned with stylish interiors, backlit marble, warm lighting and rich textured fabric that enhances the look and feel of the vessel. It sets the stage for a fabulous cabaret show performed by talented showgirls glittering beaded outfits who take you back to a time when glitz and glamour ruled.The Showboat New Year's eve deluxe dinner, of course, is a five-course seated affair, served to your table by courteous and attentive staff.In an effort to add a dash of glamour to the entire experience, the Sydney Harbour Ballroom boasts interiors that reflect the charm of yesteryear with exceptional woodwork enhanced by brass trimmings. The Harbour Ballroom New Year's Eve 2015 package includes a delightful 7-hr Sydney Harbour cruise, a deluxe buffet, DJ and dancing and the silver beverage package of Australian beers, wines, sparkling and soft drinks for the duration of the cruise.To ensure guest satisfaction and enhance the quality of the Sydney New Year's eve experience, both vessels ensure they take a very limited number of guests. Be rest assured, you can enjoy unobstructed views of the fabulous air displays, pylon projections, the stunning Sydney Harbour Bridge Effect and the dazzling 9pm family fireworks.You'd definitely want to be aboard the paddlewheelers that are illuminated with orange-coloured rope light as they join the visually stunning Harbour of Light parade that cascades down the Sydney Harbour. And, when the countdown to New Year 2016 begins, you'll have the best view in the harbour to enjoy the magnificence of the Sydney New Year fireworks that explode into the night sky when the clock strikes 12! It's a sight that will simply take your breath away, leaving you with amazing memories that will last a lifetime!For a more comprehensive guide to Sydney Showboats New Year's Eve cruises visit www.sydneyshowboats.com.au/new-year-eve-cruises.php. About the Author Warm wishes!!! Im Tom John, from Australia.Two word description for me - "Travel freak" :).Cruising is one of my passions and I am here to share a few cruise experiences I relish and cherish. Rating:
